actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Referred to Subcommittee on Rules of the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rules of the House

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to authorize certain investigations by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

summary.text: Amends rule X of the Rules of the House of Representatives to authorize the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to investigate the official conduct of a Member, officer, or employee upon notification from an employee of an officer in accordance with the adverse personnel action review procedure as promulgated by the Committee on House Administration.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to authorize certain investigations by the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.
